column4: i'm new to ubuntu, and all linux for that matter, i have an ATI radeon 7000 and can't change my screen resolution from 640x480
i'm new to ubuntu, and all linux for that matter, i have an ATI radeon 7000 and can't change my screen resolution from 640x480
only 640x480 is available in the pulldown
read the website I gave you
i did that stuff they said in the terminal, and then got lost
i just started using linux this weekend, so it could be a long process
it takes years to learn linux :)  in my case anyway ;)
even linux experts are always learning :)
